samples.question: Okay, and why do people enjoy playing computer games?

Yeah, okay, I think that is the main reason.

samples.question: Do you think that all computer games should have a minimum age for players?
samples.transcript: I would not say so. Although I understand what where this concern is coming from. I think some, or many computer games that are popular, they include a lot of violence and children, for example, under the age of, I do not know, 16, people are worried that when they are exposed to so many, Like so much, I do not know, violence can affect their behavior negatively, but I do not really think that that is the case. I think everybody including their age, like regardless of their age, understand clearly that this is not real life. And it is just a form of entertainment and I think it is pretty harmless. Okay.

samples.question: In what ways can technology in the classroom be helpful?
samples.transcript: Okay. So technology I think can be really useful in classroom. well, it can make lessons more interactive. Yeah, so they make, they streamline the process of teaching.
